author: Alparslan Ozturk
title: Turkish Makam Music for 16-Step Sequencer (R-Z)
description: Comprehensive collection of 20 fundamental Turkish makams adapted for electronic music production
reference: 1 koma = ~5.38 cents (1/9 tone) | A4=440Hz reference | 53-TET compatible

collections.description: Traditional Turkish makams with microtonal intervals and characteristic melodic progressions

metadata.description: Fundamental makam of Rast family resolving on Rast (G)
Unique makam with contrasting lowered/raised intervals resolving on Dügah (A)
Refined makam with subtle microtonal shades resolving on Segah (B)
Zirgüleli Hicaz makamının Yegâh perdesine şeddi
Hicaz ailesinden Yegâh perdesinde karar eden makam
metadata.performance_notes: Seyrine Hicaz makamından ve Neva perdesi civarından başlanır

metadata.description: Farklı bir yaklaşıma göre Buselik makamının Yegâh perdesine şeddi
metadata.comment: Bu tanım, sağlanan tabloya göre düzenlenmiştir ve önceki tanımdan farklılık göstermektedir.

metadata.description: Fundamental makam of Uşşak family resolving on Dügah (A)
Hicaz variant with extreme interval contrast resolving on Dügah (A)

metadata.comparison: Arazbar makamına benzer ancak şehnaz perdesiyle karakterize olur

metadata.description: Fundamental makam of Yegah family resolving on Yegah (G)
Hisar ve Nigar makamlarına benzer neşeli karakterde makam
metadata.comparison: Hisar makamıyla aynı dizi yapısına sahiptir ancak seyir karakteri daha hafiftir

metadata.description: Hicaz variant with Zirgüle modification resolving on Dügah (A)

performance_practices.microtonal_inflections: Performers often adjust koma values slightly based on musical context and tradition
performance_practices.rhythmic_features: Usul patterns (rhythmic cycles) are essential for proper makam performance
performance_practices.ornamentation: Extensive use of glissandi, trills (çarpma) and grace notes (mordent)
performance_practices.instrumentation: Tanbur, ney, kemençe, kanun, ud are primary instruments for makam music

appendix.temperament_notes: Frequencies based on A4=440Hz reference with koma adjustments. 1 koma ≈ 5.38 cents. Actual performances may vary slightly from theoretical values.
